title.rendered: Board Book Deal + Last Kid’s Corner

content.rendered:
Board Book Deal

Now at our Macon and Warner Robins locations, buy two board books and get a FREE onesie! Perfect for baby shower gifts. Offer applies to selected board books.

Last Week of Kid’s Corner

10:30 a.m. on Tuesday, July 19 in Warner Robins
10:30 a.m. on Thursday, July 21 in Macon

Harry Potter Week

From July 25-29, you can enter for a chance to win prizes, including a NEW Harry Potter book set! All you do to enter is bring a broom to any of our store locations. One entry per day, per location.

Melissa & Doug Toys

Gottwals Books carries Melissa & Doug toys and educational products, which were recently featured on Good Morning America. Watch to learn how low-tech toys can contribute to child development.

Free Audiobook Day

Like to listen to books while driving? Never tried it before? Free audiobook day is next week! Stay tuned for more details.

excerpt.rendered: Now at our Macon and Warner Robins locations, buy two board books and get a FREE onesie! Perfect for baby shower gifts. Offer applies to select board books.
